title: Temptation
description: Oliver Sanders, a young scholar from Oxford, arrives at the isolated Wycliffe Castle to work as a private tutor. However, his new student turns out to be not quite what he had expected.Winston Henley has been expelled from a prestigious boarding school. He is devastatingly handsome, but unfortunately he has absolutely no interest in studying, something that Oliver has to change if he wants to keep his employment.Please note: This novelette contains erotic scenes which include the practice of gay sex (oral sex and anal intercourse) and is intended for adult readers.The story also includes love and romance between gay men. If you are offended by this, please get over it or read something else...
author: Lady T.L. Jennings
